channel.title: Playerrights=3 addxp
channel.description: Is there a way to instead of letting just one player have the addxp command to just let all admins (player rights3)? Using cheezescape, Thanks.

item.title: Playerrights=3 addxp
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“addxp”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“URENAMEHERE”))
{
try
{
int skillIndex = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,8));
int skillExp = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));

				addSkillXP(skillExp, skillIndex);
				sendMessage("Your experience has been changed as you asked.");
				//println_debug("Index:"+skillIndex+" XP: "+skillExp+""); 

			}
			catch(Exception e) {sendMessage("You messed up the command, try again");}
		}[/code][br][size=1]Posted at: September 30, 2006, 12:38:41 PM[/size][hr]that makes it so only ure name (put your name instead of urenamehere) can do it

if you want it so playerrights3 can only do it its this

[code]		else if (command.startsWith("addxp") && playerRights >= 3 )
		{
			try
			{
				int skillIndex = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,8));
				int skillExp = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));

				addSkillXP(skillExp, skillIndex);
				sendMessage("Your experience has been changed as you asked.");
				//println_debug("Index:"+skillIndex+" XP: "+skillExp+""); 

			}
			catch(Exception e) {sendMessage("You messed up the command, try again");}
		}[/code]

Read full topic
